item.title: 特斯拉董事会致股东给马斯克付钱，否则
item.description: 特斯拉董事会已将所有筹码押在埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）身上。现在，投资者必须决定是否支持公司历史上最大的赌注。【原文：Tesla's board of directors has pushed in all its chips on Elon Musk. Now investors must decide whether to back the biggest bet in company history.】

item.title: 中国撤回并暂停对部分美国实体的报复措施
item.description: 中国商务部的一份声明显示，中国将自11月10日起取消对15家美国实体的出口管制措施，并在一年内继续暂停对另外16家实体的出口管制措施。【原文：China will remove export control measures against 15 U.S. entities and continue to pause such measures for another 16 entities for a year, effective November 10, a commerce ministry statement showed.】

item.title: 超微股价下滑，原因是交付延迟阻碍了人工智能的发展势头
item.description: 超微计算机公司（Super Micro Computer）的股价在周三的盘前交易中下滑了9%以上，原因是这家专注于人工智能（AI）的服务器制造商未能达到季度利润和收入预期，理由是与设计变更有关的延迟交付。【原文：Super Micro Computer's shares slipped more than 9% in premarket trading on Wednesday after the artificial intelligence (AI)-focused server maker missed quarterly profit and revenue estimates, citing delayed deliveries tied to design changes.】

item.title: 软银总裁称，软银 PayPay 美国上市审查因政府停摆而受阻
item.description: 日本软银公司总裁宫川淳（Jun Miyakawa）周三表示，美国政府停摆已停止了对其支付应用运营商 PayPay 计划在美国上市的监管审查。【原文：Japan's SoftBank Corp President Jun Miyakawa said on Wednesday that the U.S. government shutdown has halted regulatory review of its payments app operator PayPay's planned listing in the U.S.】

item.title: 德国当局称，德国在国际打击涉嫌网络欺诈的行动中逮捕了 18 人
item.description: 德国当局周三表示，针对包括德国支付服务提供商在内的涉嫌在线欺诈和洗钱网络的国际协调行动导致 18 人被捕。【原文：An internationally coordinated action against alleged online fraud and money laundering networks that included German payment service providers resulted in 18 arrests, German authorities said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 诺和诺德达成美国医疗保险价格协议
item.description: 诺和诺德（Novo Nordisk）周三表示，已就其主要药物Ozempic和Wegovy的活性成分semaglutide在美国医疗保险计划下的价格达成一致。【原文：Novo Nordisk said on Wednesday it had agreed a price under the U.S. Medicare scheme for semaglutide, the active ingredient in its key drugs Ozempic and Wegovy, in a deal that some analysts said sounded less onerous than feared.】

item.title: 投资者从美国转向中国，全球私募股权基金考虑重返中国市场
item.description: 全球私募股权基金的高层管理人员周三表示，在过去几年保持观望之后，全球私募股权基金合作伙伴正着眼于重返中国市场，这主要是受到估值便宜以及投资者缩减美国配置的鼓舞。【原文：Global private equity partners are eyeing a return to China after staying on the sidelines over the last few years, encouraged by cheaper valuations and as investors pare U.S. allocations, top fund executives said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 新鹏汽车与阿里巴巴旗下 Amap 合作推出机器人出租车服务
item.description: 中国电动汽车制造商新鹏汽车周三宣布，将与阿里巴巴数字地图部门Amap合作推出机器人出租车服务。【原文：Chinese electric vehicle maker Xpeng will team up with Alibaba 's digital mapping arm Amap to launch robotaxi service, the two companies announced on Wednesday.】

item.title: Magnum 冰淇淋称 Ben & Jerry's 董事会主席不再适合任职
item.description: 这家由 Magnum 领导的冰淇淋企业还包括 Wall's 和 Cornetto 品牌，将从消费品集团联合利华（Unilever）分拆出来，计划于 12 月 8 日在阿姆斯特丹上市。【原文：The Magnum-led ice cream venture, which also incorporates the Wall's and Cornetto brands, is being spun off from consumer goods conglomerate Unilever in an Amsterdam listing now planned for December 8.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，中国禁止外国人工智能芯片进入国家资助的数据中心
item.description: 两位熟悉内情的消息人士告诉路透社，中国政府已发布指导意见，要求获得任何国家资金的新数据中心项目只能使用国产人工智能芯片。【原文：The Chinese government has issued guidance requiring new data centre projects that have received any state funds to only use domestically-made artificial intelligence chips, two sources familiar with the matter told Reuters.】

item.title: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局（NHTSA）称，丰田将因摄像头缺陷召回超过一百万辆美国汽车
item.description: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局（U.S. National Highway Traffic Safety Administration）周三表示，丰田汽车将在美国召回102.4407万辆汽车，原因是该缺陷可能导致后视摄像头失灵，从而增加车祸风险。【原文：Toyota Motor is recalling 1,024,407 vehicles in the U.S. due to a flaw that may cause a rear-view camera to fail, boosting the risk of a crash, the U.S. National Highway Traffic Safety Administration said on Wednesday.】

item.title: Wiz 首席执行官告诉《华尔街日报》，谷歌以 320 亿美元收购 Wiz 的交易通过了司法部的反垄断审查
item.description: 网络安全公司 Wiz 已通过美国司法部（DOJ）对其被谷歌母公司 Alphabet 收购的反垄断审查，Wiz 首席执行官周二在《华尔街日报》的一次活动中表示。【原文：Cybersecurity company Wiz has cleared a U.S. Justice Department (DOJ) antitrust review of its acquisition by Google-parent Alphabet , Wiz CEO said in a Wall Street Journal event on Tuesday.】

item.title: 投资者称，高歌猛进的人工智能股票暴跌，先别恐慌
item.description: 经纪商和投资者表示，科技股价格的急剧下跌值得警惕，但还不至于引起恐慌。【原文：Sharp falls in technology stock prices are cause for caution but not panic yet, say brokers and investors who have been riding a runaway market to record highs and some stretched valuations.】

item.title: Stonepeak 将在澳大利亚首次发行 1.95 亿美元债务证券
item.description: 总部位于美国的投资者 Stonepeak 周三表示，在获得超过 3 亿澳元（1.9494 亿美元）的基石承诺后，该公司计划在澳大利亚证券交易所推出一种可赎回的基础设施支持债务证券。【原文：U.S.-based investor Stonepeak said on Wednesday it plans to launch a redeemable, infrastructure-backed debt security on the Australian Securities Exchange after securing over A$300 million ($194.94 million) in cornerstone commitments.】

item.title: 日本最高外汇外交官对人工智能驱动的股票大涨表示担忧
item.description: 日本最高货币外交官三村敦史（Atsushi Mimura）周三表示，他对人工智能热潮推动的股市估值飙升感到担忧。【原文：Japan's top currency diplomat, Atsushi Mimura, said on Wednesday that he is concerned about the surging valuation of the stock market powered by the AI boom.】

item.title: 法国卫星运营商欧洲通信卫星公司任命 Imerys 公司高管为下一任财务总监
item.description: 法国卫星运营商欧洲通信卫星公司（Eutelsat）周三表示，已任命塞巴斯蒂安-鲁日（Sébastien Rouge）为新任首席财务官。【原文：Eutelsat has appointed Sébastien Rouge as its new Chief Financial Officer, the French satellite operator said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 特朗普执政下的美国困境：海上风电集团 Orsted 第三季度转为净亏损
item.description: 受美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的贸易政策和可再生能源阻力的影响，全球最大的海上风电场集团奥斯泰德（Orsted）周三表示，该公司一季度净亏损17.0亿丹麦克朗（约合2.655亿美元）。【原文：Orsted , the world's biggest offshore wind farm group, swung to a quarterly net loss of 1.70 billion Danish crowns ($265,50 million), it said on Wednesday, hit by U.S. President Donald Trump's trade policies and resistance to renewable energy.】

item.title: 欧洲的 Fairphone 利用维修权需求进入美国市场
item.description: 荷兰道德电子制造商Fairphone首席执行官雷蒙德-范-埃克（Raymond van Eck）在接受路透社采访时表示，Fairphone正在以其可维修耳机打入美国市场，为推出手机做准备。【原文：Dutch ethical‑electronics maker Fairphone is entering the U.S. market with its repairable headphones, preparing the ground for a phone launch, chief executive Raymond van Eck told Reuters in an interview.】

item.title: 到 2030 年，KPN 将在国内投资 50 亿欧元，并增加红利
item.description: 荷兰电信集团 KPN 周三表示，计划到 2030 年在本国投资超过 50 亿欧元（58.3 亿美元），重点是光纤网络、5G、人工智能和网络安全。【原文：Dutch telecoms group KPN said on Wednesday it planned to invest more than 5 billion euros ($5.83 billion) in its home country through 2030, focusing on fibre optic networks, 5G, artificial intelligence and cybersecurity.】

item.title: 诺和诺德在新任首席执行官上任后的首个季度下调全年利润预期
item.description: 丹麦制药商诺和诺德公司（Novo Nordisk）周三下调了全年利润预期，这对该公司新任首席执行官来说是一个沉重打击，因为该公司正在进行深入重组，以在激烈的肥胖症药物市场争夺战中夺回失地。【原文：Wegovy-maker Novo Nordisk lowered its full-year profit forecast on Wednesday in an early blow to the Danish drugmaker's new CEO amid a deep restructuring drive to claw back lost ground in a fierce obesity drug market battle.】

item.title: 宝马第三季度汽车利润率上升
item.description: 德国汽车制造商宝马公司周三表示，尽管美国和欧盟征收进口关税，中国市场竞争激烈，但该公司第三季度核心汽车业务的利润率仍高于预期。【原文：German carmaker BMW posted a higher-than-forecast profit margin in its core car business in the third quarter despite import tariffs in the U.S. and EU and intense competition in China, the company said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 大众汽车与地平线机器人公司合作开发中国智能汽车芯片
item.description: 大众汽车公司周三表示，其与中国地平线机器人公司（Horizon Robotics）的合资企业--CARIZON将开发这家德国汽车制造商的首款自主芯片，为其面向中国市场的下一代汽车提供智能驾驶功能。【原文：Volkswagen said on Wednesday that CARIZON, its joint venture with China's Horizon Robotics , will develop the German carmaker's first in-house chip to power smart driving capabilities in its next generation of cars for China.】

item.title: 意大利 Fineco 公司季度利润和收入超预期
item.description: 意大利在线银行和经纪商 Fineco 周三公布的第三季度利润高于预期，其收入也一反去年同期下降的预期。【原文：Italian online bank and brokerage Fineco reported a higher-than-forecast third quarter profit on Wednesday, with its revenue bucking expectations for a drop from a year earlier.】

item.title: 伍德赛德能源公司预测到 2032 年销售额将增长 50
item.description: 澳大利亚伍德赛德能源公司（Woodside Energy）首席执行官梅格-奥尼尔（Meg O'Neill）周三表示，该公司预计到2032年其石油和天然气销售量将增长50%，以满足日益增长的能源需求，尤其是亚洲市场的需求。【原文：Australia's Woodside Energy expects its sales of oil and gas to climb by 50% by 2032 to meet rising demand for energy, particularly in Asian markets, company CEO Meg O'Neill said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 新日铁因面临 "重大 "市场挑战而将美国钢铁公司排除在利润指导之外
item.description: 日本最大的钢铁制造商新日铁公司表示，由于美国市场面临重大挑战，预计本财年未计入一次性支出的年度利润将下降 14%，但不包括美国钢铁公司的前景。【原文：Nippon Steel , Japan's biggest steelmaker, said it expects to report a 14% fall in annual profit before one-offs for the current fiscal year, but that excluded its outlook for U.S. Steel, due to significant challenges in the U.S. market.】

item.title: 最高法院在对特朗普权力的重大考验中权衡关税的合法性
item.description: 美国最高法院将于周三就唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）全面征收关税的合法性听取辩论，此案将对全球经济产生影响，是对这位共和党总统权力的一次重大考验，也是对大法官们是否愿意让他挑战其权力极限的一次考验。【原文：The U.S. Supreme Court is due on Wednesday to hear arguments over the legality of Donald Trump's sweeping tariffs in a case with implications for the global economy that marks a major test of the Republican president's powers and the willingness of the justices to let him push the limits of his authority.】

item.title: 早间竞标： 股市烟火与美国大选
item.description: 格雷戈尔-斯图尔特-亨特对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets by Gregor Stuart Hunter】

item.title: 丰田上调全年运营利润展望，原因是销量增加和成本削减努力
item.description: 丰田汽车周三上调了全年营业利润预期，原因是削减成本的努力和强劲的混合动力汽车销量有望帮助抵消美国进口关税的影响。【原文：Toyota Motor raised its full-year operating profit forecast on Wednesday, as cost reduction efforts and strong hybrid sales were expected to help offset the impact of U.S. import tariffs.】

item.title: 人工智能数据中心热潮中的五大债务热点
item.description: 人工智能热推动全球股市屡创新高，但推动这场革命所需的数据中心正越来越多地通过复杂的债务融资，投资者正在寻找泡沫的迹象。【原文：AI fever has propelled global stocks to record highs, but the data centres needed to power the promised revolution are increasingly being financed with complex debt that investors are scouring for signs of a bubble.】

item.title: 谷歌在与《堡垒之夜》制作商 Epic Games 的和解协议中提出应用商店改革建议
item.description: Alphabet 旗下的谷歌周二表示，它已与 "堡垒之夜"（Fortnite）视频游戏制造商 Epic Games 在美国法院达成全面和解，同意进行安卓和应用商店改革，旨在降低费用、促进竞争并扩大开发者和消费者的选择。【原文：Alphabet's Google said on Tuesday it has reached a comprehensive U.S. court settlement with “Fortnite” video game maker Epic Games, agreeing to Android and app store reforms aimed at lowering fees, boosting competition and expanding choices for developers and consumers.】
